text: Rostislav Glebovich () (died 1165) was the prince of Minsk between 1146 and 1165, and was the son of Gleb Vseslavich.WikiTree — Prince of Minsk ==References and sources== Category:Rurik dynasty Category:Belarusian rulers Category:12th-century princes in Kievan Rus' Category:Eastern Orthodox monarchs Category:Year of birth unknown Category:1165 deaths
title: Rostislav Glebovich
